faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Kaia

q1.question: Is Kaia free?
q1.answer: Yes, Kaia is completely free during the MVP phase. We will offer premium plans in the future with advanced features.

q2.question: Is it available on iOS?
q2.answer: Currently only on Android. The iOS version is in development and will be available soon.

q3.question: Does Kaia work offline?
q3.answer: Some basic functions work offline. AI and messaging features require an internet connection.

q4.question: Is my data safe?
q4.answer: Absolutely. We use end-to-end encryption and don't share your data with third parties. Your privacy is our priority.

q5.question: Can I sync with Google Calendar?
q5.answer: This feature is in development and will be available in upcoming updates.

q6.question: Does Kaia drain the battery?
q6.answer: No. Kaia is optimized to use minimal resources and preserve your device's battery.
